name: DSQL

screenshots.caption: A simple GUI is provided to edit and execute scripts

short_description: DSQL ("Dynamic" SQL) is a scripting language for SQL, aka Perl for JDBC. It allows rapid development of code to perform database programming, data warehousing and import/export from databases, XML, Excel, etc.
